snippet.title: DARK POINT GAMES PRESENTS | ABOUT... THE STUDIO
snippet.description:
⚔️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1314000/Achilles_Legends_Untold/

There are many secrets waiting for you in the world of myths - today we will reveal one of them. We present to you Paweł Waszak - our CEO and Lead Game Designer at Dark Point Games, who will tell you about inspirations, out team's experience and about our game, of course.

See for yourself what awaits you in the newest production of Dark Point Games - Achilles: Legends Untold! Add it to your wishlist!
